item.title: Barrow Brothers Spawn Command
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

I am currently coding a barrow brothers command, to spawn the barrow brothers on the coords of the player who types the command. I currently am having some problems, and would love it if someone could assist me.

if (inputString.equals("::bb")) { int i1 = (myPlayer.x - 6 >> 7) + baseX; int j2 = (myPlayer.y - 6 >> 7) + baseY; stream.createFrame(132); stream.method433(i1); stream.writeWord(6821); stream.method432(j2);

Read full topic
